item.title: Group Founded By Stacey Abrams Finally Shuts Its Doors After Historic Campaign Finance Violations
item.description: 'The New Georgia Project was an advocacy organization that was masquerading as a nonpartisan nonprofit,' said Hans von Spakovsky.

item.title: Here Are 6 Key Moments From SCOTUS Arguments In Landmark Race-Based Redistricting Case
item.description: Here are the biggest moments from Supreme Court oral arguments in Louisiana v. Callais and Robinson v. Callais.

item.title: Judge Says Trump Can’t Fire Democrat Bureaucrats Because It Hurts Her Feelings
item.description: Judge Illston doesn’t articulate why Clinton RIFs were good but Trump RIFs are a violent hatchet attack, but she clearly feels it.

item.title: ‘No Kings’ Isn’t Protecting Democracy, But Suppressing It
item.description: 'No Kings' isn’t a defense of democracy at all. Instead, it’s a defense of the entrenched power of the Democratic Party.

item.title: Illinois Released The Illegal Alien Accused Of Abusing My Daughter’s Body, So I Had To Report Him To ICE Myself
item.description: My daughter’s death exposes how Illinois’s criminal justice and sanctuary policies failed her.
